scripts.clean:generated: rm -rf docs && mkdir docs && touch docs/.gitkeep
scripts.clean:node_modules: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && rm -f yarn.lock
scripts.generate:injector: yarn clean:generated && OUT_DIR=`pwd`/docs yarn workspace @equilab/network build && sleep 2 && yarn workspace @equilab/network generate
